name: OR_LNLG_ANINF_DIAG
description: The OR_LNLG_ANINF_DIAG table contains the Anesthesia Information Diagnosis for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
